original_text: With him I speak mouth to mouth, clearly, and not in riddles, and he beholds the form of the Lord. Why then were you not afraid to speak against my servant Moses?”
korean_text: 그와는 내가 대면하여 명백히 말하고 은밀한 말로 하지 아니하며 그는 또 여호와의 형상을 보거늘 너희가 어찌하여 내 종 모세 비방하기를 두려워하지 아니하느냐

sentences.original_text: With him I speak mouth to mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그와 입 대 입으로 말한다

sentences.original_text: and he beholds the form of the Lord
Why then were you not afraid
to speak against my servant Moses?”
